mapper.select: select p.product_id,m.manager_name,p.product_name, p.category,p.product_price,i.product_img_url,p.product_new,p.product_best from product p, manager m, product_image i where p.product_id = i.product_id and p.manager_id = m.manager_id and p.category like #{cate} and i.product_img_type = 'thumb' limit #{findingCount} offset #{dbLimitStart};
select count(*) from product where category like #{cate};
